title: Man holding a banner
description: Photographer's description: Protestors before & after Mubarak and how they show happy, photos of Ahmed Shafik speaking at his place. Text in image: الحمد لله رأيت نصر أكتوبر و أنا مقاتل و رأيت نصر 25 يناير و أنا مشارك أموت و أنا مرتاح. مقاتل, حرب أكتوبر . Translation of Text in image: Thank God I saw victory in the October War and saw the victory of the 25th January Revolution while being a part of it I'll die relieved for that. Signed: Warrior, October War.
subject-lcsh: Israel-Arab War, 1973; Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
